# `DecisionTableInputColumnExpression` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| contractual | [`Contractual`](contractual-definition.md) | Yes | A value that is defined by a contract schema and used to form the left side of a logical condition. |
| comparator | `string` | Yes | A comparator used to join the left and right sides of a logical condition. |
